name: exFate_sen
description:
DETAILS

A Classic 2D platformer game with a twist even the developer couldn't play it right. This game have some horror element and have flashy screen that might not good for some people. There is no unfair moment in this game but, this game is brutally hard

CONTROLS

Do you have keyBoard? great you can play that. if not i am sorry man! Use arrow keys to move player around

OTHER INFORMATION

All files are suitable for windows 7 32-bit and windows xp. If you guys do not know about java download this file exFate_sen.rar.
